onchange.description: Fires the moment when the value of the element is changed.

oncontextmenu.description: Script to be run when a context menu is triggered.

onselect.description: Fires after some text has been selected in an element.

onkeydown.description: Fires when a user is pressing a key.

args.name: e
args.description: Fires when a user presses a key.

onkeypress.description: Fires when a user is pressing a key.

onkeyup.description: Fires when a user releases a key.

onclick.description: Fires on a mouse click on the element.

ondblclick.description: Fires on a mouse double-click on the element.

onmousedown.description: Fires when a mouse button is pressed down on an element.

onmousemove.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

onmouseout.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves out of an element.

onmouseover.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

onmouseup.description: Fires when a mouse button is released over an element.

onmousewheel.description: Script to be run when the mouse wheel is being rotated.

onscroll.description: Script to be run when an element's scrollbar is being scrolled.

listType.description: Defines the type of the list

valueOptions.name: ul
valueOptions.description: Type of the list is unodrered list.

valueOptions.name: ol
valueOptions.description: Type of the list is ordered list.

reversed.description: Specifies that the list order should be descending (9,8,7...).

start.description: Specifies the start value of the first list item in the ordered list.

type.description: Specifies the start value of the first list item in the ordered list.

valueOptions.name: a
valueOptions.description: Alphabetically ordered list, lowercase (a, b, c, d).

valueOptions.name: A
valueOptions.description: Alphabetically ordered list, uppercase (A, B, C, D).

valueOptions.name: i
valueOptions.description: Roman numbers, lowercase (i, ii, iii, iv).

valueOptions.name: I
valueOptions.description: Roman numbers, uppercase (I, II, III, IV).

accesskey.description: Specifies a shortcut key to activate/focus an element

contextmenu.description: Specifies a context menu for an element. The context menu appears when a user right-clicks on the element.

dir.description: Specifies the text direction for the content in an element.

lang.description: Specifies the language of the element's content.

style.description: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.

tabindex.description: Specifies the tabbing order of an element.

title.description: Specifies extra information about an element.

translate.description: Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not.
